item.title: Plastic fencing has been sat on the entrance to the roundabout for over 6 months as you approach from a40 roundabout . item.title: Partial failure of bridge structure, 19th April
item.description:
The bridge on the footpath connecting North Road East to Hatherley Lane and ASDA Cheltenham has significant subsidence on one side which is well over an inch deep in places and at least one metre long.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Roxton Drive, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 19th April
